backend/main.mo: Actor implementing article CRUD, publish workflow, admin auth, and blob storage integrations using maps and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration converting single admin password into a username‑keyed credential map while preserving session data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests supporting the updated admin login feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, editors, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining public and admin routes, redirects, and overall theme/layout providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublishTog: Button component to publish or unpublish articles with loading states and error‑aware toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Admin login form collecting username/password and submitting through the session hook with error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guard rendering admin content only when authenticated, otherwise showing the login form.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentB: Renderer converting simple markdown‑style syntax to HTML and inserting it into a styled container.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentC: Displays an article preview card with cover image, title, excerpt, and formatted date, linking to the article page.
frontend/src/components/editor/BodyEdito: Markdown-enabled textarea editor with an optional image upload panel that inserts uploaded images as markdown.
frontend/src/components/editor/ImageUplo: Handles image file validation, uploads via ExternalBlob with progress tracking, and shows a preview with removal controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main site layout with header navigation, authentication-aware admin actions, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: React Query hooks for admin operations like fetching, creating, updating, publishing, and unpublishing articles.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login sessions with token storage, expiration handling, and login/logout helpers tied to the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentPublic.ts: React Query hooks for fetching publicly available published articles and article details.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes. Adds utility styles such as global border and image styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard listing all articles with status, edit buttons, and publish toggles, wrapped in admin access control.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentEditorPa: Article creation/editing form with title, body, image upload, and save handling including error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesListPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of published articles with loading skeletons and fallback UI when empty.
frontend/src/pages/ContentDetailPage.tsx: Shows full article details with cover image, metadata, body rendering, and admin edit access; handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a hero banner and a call-to-action linking to the articles section.
frontend/src/pages/NotesListPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for notes listing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and syncing persisted values, including hash-based param handling and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project state, existing and new feature requests, and admin credential upgrade requirements.
